name: df-meas
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmeas, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(csiga)), cab(s1, w3a(wf(cv(s1), cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wdisj(s3, cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s2))), cesum(s3, cv(s2), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))))
comment: Define a measure as a nonnegative countably additive function over a sigma-algebra onto ` ( 0 [,] +oo ) ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Sep-2016.)
